reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A handsome watch for a handsome guy
reviews.author: Customer
reviews.content: Ha. This is a watch of contradictions. Cheap, yet well-made. Small, but noticeable. Old, but it feels so damn new. The watch performs flawlessly and despite mentions of it being retro, it is slick, modern, and even better looking in person.I will say, however, that I found the included contract unusual and potentially disturbing. When I placed the order, a prompt I’d never seen before appeared, inviting me to read and sign a contract. The document stated rather explicitly that the watch was for “handsome guys” and that I would not be permitted to wear it if I was a “major uggo”. Whatever. I signed the contract and placed the order. What happened next was the truly unexpected...Two days after placing the order, I received a knock on my door very late at night. I wish I could tell you what time it was, but I did not yet own the watch so it is impossible to say. I peered through my peephole and saw the figure of a tall man in a long coat. Slowly, I opened the door and asked him what he wanted. It’s then I noticed a wristwatch with the largest band I’d ever seen wrapped around his forehead. It was analog, so I couldn’t tell the time. The man introduced himself in a voice so quiet his words were almost drowned out by the ticking of his pretentious headwatch. “I’m with Casio,” he says. Or maybe “Dime sith mass E oh”. Hard to say. Still confused, I asked him again what he wanted. It was then that things took a turn for the worse.Uninvited, he stepped into my home and grabbed my face with his cold, dry, watch-tuning fingers. I tried to resist and found my body unresponsive. I’ve later theorized that his stupid, unreadable headwatch was in some way hypnotic and temporarily robbed me of my senses. By the dim porch light, he jerked my head around, carefully but methodically inspecting every angle of my face. It obviously wasn’t the first time he’d conducted this sick facial analysis.Suddenly, he stopped. With me still immobile and deathly frightened, he took a step back, gave me one final, fleeting check and muttered “Acceptable. Seven out of ten.” Having said this, he promptly tapped the dial on his gaudy headwatch and I fell to the ground, exhausted and overwhelmed by my experience, but released from his spell.The next thing I knew, it was morning and someone was calling for me. “Sir? Sir? Are you okay?” I looked up and saw my door was agape and the mail person stood above me, package in hand. Embarrassed to have been defeated by the mysterious man and his unfashionable watch, I simply nodded and began to stand. Obviously unsettled, the mail person handed me the package as I rose and told me to have a good day. It was my watch! And boy, what a watch it is!The moral of the story is this: the watch is incredible, and at $20 perhaps the finest entry-level watch money can buy.However, potential buyer, I caution you this: if you are any less than a 6.5 or 7 out of 10, don’t kid yourself. Perhaps you’ve got more a F91W or G-Shock type of face, and that’s nothing to feel bad about. Not everyone can be handsome! Just be careful - I’ve heard the watchman and his hideous headwatch do not look kindly upon the unattractive.
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States September 25, 2021

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Affordable Watch
reviews.author: John Taylor
reviews.content: I got the watch because I wanted to be able to have a digital clock with the second counter while I was at work. I have an apple watch but sometimes want to wear just a simple watch. The silver is a perfect color and hasn’t tarnished or anything for the time i’ve had it. The instructions were easy to use for setup but there was no instructions on how to adjust the size of the watch which was odd because it isn’t that obvious to figure out. After a short google search I was able to resize it fairly easy. I like that it shows the date information as well as it having a light for low light situations. I love the watch and can see it becoming my daily watch as it is very stylish too.
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States July 16, 2024

reviews.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars A good, functional classic watch.
reviews.author: Michael Bridges
reviews.content: Sometimes it's really hard to beat the classics in terms of style. I bought this just to wear with some outfits and change up from my other watches.Pros: Easy to setup, easy to read in general lighting, easy to adjust band size on the fly without any tools. In my opinion, I don't think this specific style will ever not go with just a simple "day out" outfit. If you're a little exhausted of smart watches like I am, this can offer some reprieve- the features this has is standard digital watch features, but work really well.Cons: The light on this model has always been mediocre- If you are using your watch in a dark environment consistently, be mindful of that. It seems to only shine from the left side of the face, and can be hard to read. If you're a guy with arm hair, the default band seems to grab and pull a little more than other bands. Speaking of the band, if you have broader wrist/arms, this band and face may look a little out of place with how small they are.Overall, it's hard to beat the price point for the style of watch you're getting. They seem to last quite awhile as well. A great budget beginner watch to jump start a collection with.
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States May 29, 2023

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Greatest watch of all time.
reviews.author: Cesar Hurtado
reviews.content: First of all, has a very aesthetic design. Low profile so the head doesn't get caught on long sleeves, very compact design, not bulky.My work is time sensitive so I'm constantly looking at my watch and keeping track of time intervals with the watch's stopwatch two clicks away, also has alarm to wake you up in the morning. Super cost efficient, no need to boast with expensive, non-versatile time piece.A symbol of elite status.
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States July 14, 2024

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Timeless Gift: Casio Men's A158WA-1DF Stainless Steel Digital Watch
reviews.author: Celeste
reviews.content: I am thrilled to share my experience with the Casio Men's A158WA-1DF Stainless Steel Digital Watch, which was the perfect Christmas gift for my boyfriend. This timepiece has exceeded our expectations regarding style, functionality, and overall quality.Classic Stainless Steel Design:The stainless steel construction of this Casio watch exudes a classic and timeless appeal. The polished finish adds a touch of sophistication, making it suitable for both casual and formal occasions. The durability of the stainless steel ensures that the watch can withstand everyday wear without losing its luster.Clear Digital Display:The digital display of the A158WA-1DF is clear and easy to read. The LED screen provides a crisp view of the time, day, and date, allowing for quick and convenient time checks. The simplicity of the display adds to the overall user-friendly design.Lightweight and Comfortable:One of the notable features is the lightweight feel of the watch. Despite its stainless steel construction, the A158WA-1DF sits comfortably on the wrist, making it suitable for extended wear. The adjustable strap ensures a secure and personalized fit.Water-Resistant Functionality:The water-resistant feature is a practical addition to the watch's versatility. While not designed for deep-water activities, it provides peace of mind against accidental splashes or exposure to rain.Reliable Timekeeping:Casio is renowned for producing reliable timepieces; the A158WA-1DF is no exception. The watch has maintained accurate timekeeping, and the digital quartz movement ensures precision and reliability.Affordable Luxury:One of the standout aspects of this watch is its affordability without compromising on quality. It delivers a sense of luxury and style that one might expect from a more expensive timepiece. It's a fantastic value for the price.In conclusion, the Casio Men's A158WA-1DF Stainless Steel Digital Watch has proven to be an exceptional Christmas gift for my boyfriend. Its classic design, clear digital display, comfort, and reliability make it a standout choice in affordable timepieces. I highly recommend it to anyone searching for a stylish, functional watch that won't break the bank.
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States January 7, 2024

Let's put it like that.It is adjustable, so even skinny men like me have no problem using this watch.The provided manual doesn't explain anything on how to adjust the belt, but go to YouTube and watch a tutorial. You'll find out how to adjust it and it is pretty easy.It beeps every hour and it sounds loud enough.

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars makes my day a little bit better
reviews.author: m
reviews.content: I have a job which I hate, and I don't enjoy working so much. I often get hurt at work, I'm tired, and I am aching with back pain even at my young age. Owning this watch has not made any major change in my life, there is only so much a watch can do for you. But I enjoy wearing this watch, It's something small which I can enjoy without any expectations.I have enjoyment from watching television and drawing pictures, learning languages. But all of these things come along with expectations. I expect to be entertained by a show, or to have a productive session of drawing or studying. sometimes my expectations are not met, and I end up feeling bad. Wearing this watch comes along with no expectations, and I still enjoy it. building expectations for how things should go seems to have a unique ability for sucking the joy out of otherwise pleasant or good things. so a simple thing like this which will only ever do what i expect it to do, and brings me some small happiness by it's pretty look, is a valuable thing worth much more than what i paid for it.
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States June 19, 2024

It’s a very nice look, I’ve had this watch for a few months now, I accidentally left it the pocket of my pants and put them to wash and as scared as I was when I found the watch when folding clothes, it’s still worked PERFECTLY! Through washer AND dryer it still works as good as new, there’s a stop watch, an alarm, and the month and date on the watch there’s also a functioning light in the watch for when it’s dark and can’t see, you can’t see anything in the picture (the camera didn’t pick it up) but trust that it’s very visible in person, also a side note; the watch beeps every hour. Overall, I love it and I am happy with my purchase.

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just like I remember
reviews.author: Erik G
reviews.content: Accurate digital time, looks sharp on the wrist, and just pure physical nostalgia. It feels like 1989 every time I check the time. For the price, you can't ask for better. One note: the backlight is basically useless. It's like there's a tiny, tiny light bulb in the upper left corner that tries to cast light across the face, but the light barely makes it half way across. if you want to know more than what hour it is, you're out of luck--minutes in the dark are slightly better than a guess, and seconds are just not visible. But the thing is: that is 100% period-accurate for digital watches in the 80's. I had a watch with a back light just as bad when a kid. It's worthless as a backlight, but the memory of its uselessness still makes me smile. So, maybe not great if you're trying to conduct spy missions in the night. But as a fun watch that you don't have to worry about scuffing up--with tons of GenX-flashback potential--it's perfect.
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States May 15, 2024
